trans-unit.source: Interacts with the parser to build an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 分析器以生成与交互<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The HtmlSelectBuilder control interacts with the page parser to build an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 页分析器，以生成与交互 HtmlSelectBuilder 控件<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: Use the HtmlSelectBuilder control to customize the parsing of an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: HtmlSelectBuilder 控件用于自定义的分析<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A> property is set to `false` so that white space is always ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A>属性设置为`false`以便空格始终被忽略。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A> method to determine the type of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's child controls.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A>方法来确定的一种<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件的子控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder"></xref> class.
Determines whether the white space literals in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control are to be processed or ignored.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否空白中的文本<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref>控件要进行处理或忽略。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to always ignore white space in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将替代<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法始终忽略中的白色空间<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, indicating that white space in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 此方法始终返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>中的空白，该值指示<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref>控件将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Obtains the <xref:System.Type> for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control's child controls.
Use the GetChildControlType method to return the <xref:System.Type> of a specified child control in an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: GetChildControlType 方法用于返回<xref:System.Type>中指定的子控件<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The tag name of the child control.
An array of attributes contained in the child control.
trans-unit.target: 包含子控件中包含的特性的数组。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control's specified child control.
